full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI DKAR NAG KHA MCHU GCOD TSUL RNO NGAR SPU GRI ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(CES RTA MGRIN @003B GSANG SGRUB KYI SGO NAS DKAR NAG KHA MCHU GCOD TSUL RNO NGAR SPU GRI ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, DON GNYER CAN 'GA' ZHIG GIS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BAR BRTEN NAS BTZUN GZUGS DHARMA BADZRA GYIS BYA KHYUNG RI KHROD DU SBYAR BA'O, ,)
